fields.name: Weather Effect:
fields.value:
- At the end of each round, the player who was hit the most by harmful effects (ties broken randomly) will be given an <:impact:1106704414225485894> equal to the amount of remaining players.
- The specifics of how they were hit doesn't matter. Could be targeted, could be a "next player"-type effect, or it could even be an indirect effect. All that matters is that the effects are harmful.
